valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 4 Nov 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 5 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low 100 miles west of Bailey 965 moving steadily northeast, losing its identity by 1800 Tuesday

FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In southeast, southerly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 later. In northwest, southerly or southwesterly 5 to 7, decreasing 3 to 5 later.
Sea state
In southeast, rough or very rough. in northwest, rough or very rough.
Weather
In southeast, thundery rain or showers. In northwest, occasional rain, fog patches.
Visibility
In southeast, good, occasionally poor. In northwest, moderate or good, occasionally very poor.
